resources.string:
Try to find our suspicious token around this page with the steps below
 1. Build a debug APK of this application.
 2. Find suspicious token in the debug APK with reverse engineering technique.
 3. Build a release APK of this application.
 4. Find suspicious token in the release APK with reverse engineering technique.

 Bonus
 1. Find a deep link to NavGraph Home D page in the release APK with reverse engineering technique.
